attributes.title: terrible👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻
attributes.review: i got this app and it took a week to download and none of my other apps did that. also it asked kept asking me for notifications but i said no and it still kept asking. also there was like this membership thing and ads of course. i would not recommend getting this app tell people about that it’s terrible and write a bad review so people know not to get it!😤👎🏻👎🏻🤢🤮🤢🤮🤡

attributes.title: No
attributes.review: This app did not give me a reason to vote for him all the content is fake and it has many glitches and can be easily hacked into, this  should be taken down from the App Store.

attributes.title: No😍
attributes.review: I downloaded the app while my dog was next to me✨. I opened the app and the first thing that i see is this orange head with hay on it and a cantaloupe body👿. i wanted to gag🚫🤢💔. anyways my dog had a heart attack looking at that picture,so now he's in the hospital🥺🤬.

attributes.title: He killed my grandma
attributes.review: just a few years ago he meet and married my 129 year old grandmother. Trump stole her money then he ran her over with a sleigh and reindeers 😬🤭😥. i wasn’t happy with his eulogy he gave at her funeral (located in the North Pole) anyways the app isn’t good.

attributes.title: This app made my brain hurt
attributes.review: I thought it would be a good idea to get the trump app to see what it was all about. As soon as I opened the app my brain started to fry and now I’m brain dead. 10/10 would NOT recommend.

attributes.title: It hacked my phone!!! 😭😔💔
attributes.review:
Do I downloaded this thinking I was doing something good for once & then when I open it, it starts saying that my phone is being hacked! 😖😔😭
I really don’t want you to get your phone hacked!!!!!! 💔💔💔

attributes.title: All Candidates Matter 😚💅🏼✨
attributes.review: This is a very bad app 0/10 recommend. It reflects the 0/10 on Donald Trump, or is it the other way around. Anyway give this a 1 star to get this off the app store because I can't stand to see this ❤️

attributes.title: worst app ever
attributes.review: as i went to go type in my email and password to login to my account it told me that i was being hacked next thing i know all my money is gone out of my bank account!! yes really and my emails are blowing up with spam!!! this is an outrage all i wanted to do was support our lovely racist sexist president and this is what he does to me!!! terrible i will be letting all the fellow lady’s at brunch know this you have lost my vote

attributes.title: Hacked🤬😡
attributes.review: The second I opened the app I got black lives matter picture all over my phone and then Joe biden came to my house to make me delete the app. I hate it do not recommend even if you are a trump supporter

so i wanted to know, has anyone seen my orange? i think it rolled away in the cafeteria. i dont like my orange but it would be nice to know where it went so i can trash it, last i heard is he rolled into his bunker??? i dont know but i guess someone found him and tried to trash him for me, thanks whoever that was. but i guess he got scared and ran away. that old is so moldy so if you see him and he says he is good, dont believe him and throw him in the trash.
